plugin-package.name: Sync Connector Web
plugin-package.long-description:
This plugin provides the portal services required by Liferay Sync desktop and mobile clients.

Please visit https://www.liferay.com/products/liferay-sync/features for more information on downloading the Liferay Sync desktop and mobile clients. Liferay Sync is compatible with both desktop and mobile environments including Windows, Mac OS, iOS, and Android.
plugin-package.author: Liferay, Inc.
